ygData.subject: Back, and interesting run in with Bronxx
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, finally back from vacation, and good to see you all here. : ) Missed you guys. Anyways, thought I d point out a known bug that could end up with you
ygData.messageBody:
Well, finally back from vacation, and good to see you all here. : ) Missed you guys.

Anyways, thought I'd point out a known bug that could end up with you waiting for a couple of hours for a GM. Just so you're aware of it.

In Runnyeye, people like to congregate near the zone to Gorge and pull goblins guards, elites, etc... If you get in trouble, the zone is right there. No troubles. Well, I'm sure some of us here have encountered the unique eye, Bronxx or something like that. He's a named eye, and unfortunately turned his gaze on me. I was running for the zone when WHAM, go hit with a force shock. I run, and turn a corner and it's a dead end. Blank stone no where to run. The force shock had thrown me past the zone point and into the dead end. I run back, and try to zone again, but got hit with another force shock before I had time to turn around and try to zone again. Me dead. Trying to recover my body didn't work because I'd zone. Now, after typing in /who all gm and finding no one on, a cold ball of lead materialised in my stomach.

To make matters short, I got my corpse back now, I'm back on, and happy to see everyone again. Say, shouldn't a bunch of us meet in irc or something and come up with a faq for us wizards? I know there's a ton of things that people ask all the time, and we should go over past digests and see what to put in. Just my 2ï¿½...

Zalbar
18th Wizard Solusek Ro

P.S. I'm starting to get level and name anxiety !!
